short.thesis: AI infrastructure demand accelerating. Data center revenue growth exceeding expectations. Near-term catalyst with earnings.
Reels monetization improving rapidly. Cost discipline driving margin expansion. Ad market recovery underway.
AWS re-acceleration visible. Retail margins expanding. Advertising business growing 20%+ YoY.
Cybertruck production ramping. Energy storage business accelerating. FSD improvements driving take rate.

medium.thesis: Azure growth reaccelerating with AI workloads. Copilot monetization just beginning. Enterprise moat strengthening.
Search moat intact despite AI fears. Cloud growth strong. Gemini integration across products.
Cross-border travel recovery ongoing. Digital payments secular growth. Pricing power intact.
Healthcare cost management expertise. Optum growth engine. Demographic tailwinds.
Pro segment resilient. Housing turnover will recover. Market share gains from competitors.

long.thesis: Services flywheel compounding. Ecosystem stickiness unmatched. Vision Pro opens new category. India growth.
Best-in-class bank. Net interest income benefiting from rates. Investment banking recovery coming.
Pharma pipeline strong post-split. MedTech recovery. Dividend aristocrat with pricing power.
Low-cost producer. Pioneer acquisition accretive. Strong capital return program.
Pricing power demonstrated. Volume recovery in emerging markets. Innovation pipeline strong.

risks.name: Inflation Persistence
risks.description: Core inflation remains sticky above Feds 2% target, particularly in services and shelter.
risks.potentialImpact: May delay rate cuts, pressure growth stock multiples

risks.name: Geopolitical Tensions
risks.description: Escalating conflicts in multiple regions affecting supply chains and commodity prices.
risks.potentialImpact: Oil price spikes, semiconductor supply disruption, defense rotation

risks.name: China Economic Slowdown
risks.description: Property sector stress and weak consumer spending in China affecting global growth.
risks.potentialImpact: Commodity demand weakness, multinational revenue headwinds

risks.name: Tech Valuation Correction
risks.description: AI enthusiasm has pushed tech valuations to elevated levels relative to history.
risks.potentialImpact: Mean reversion if growth disappoints, rotation to value

risks.name: Credit Tightening
risks.description: Banks maintaining tight lending standards, commercial real estate stress ongoing.
risks.potentialImpact: Higher borrowing costs, CRE defaults, bank stress

market.headline: Fed Officials Signal Patience on Rate Cuts Amid Sticky Inflation
market.excerpt: Federal Reserve officials indicated they need more confidence inflation is heading to 2% before cutting rates.

market.headline: S&P 500 Hits Record High as Tech Rally Continues
market.excerpt: The benchmark index reached new all-time highs driven by strong earnings from technology giants.

market.headline: Treasury Yields Rise After Strong Employment Report
market.excerpt: Bond yields climbed after data showed the labor market remains resilient.

market.headline: Oil Prices Surge on Middle East Supply Concerns
market.excerpt: Crude oil jumped 3% as geopolitical tensions raised supply disruption fears.

market.headline: Q4 Earnings Season Off to Strong Start
market.excerpt: Early reporters beating estimates at higher rate than historical average.

market.headline: Dollar Strengthens as Rate Cut Expectations Moderate
market.excerpt: The dollar index rose to three-week highs as traders push back rate cut timing.

market.headline: China Manufacturing PMI Unexpectedly Contracts
market.excerpt: Factory activity shrank for the first time in three months, signaling ongoing economic challenges.

market.headline: Consumer Spending Remains Resilient Despite High Rates
market.excerpt: Retail sales data beat expectations, showing American consumers continue to spend.
